title: Website Developer
description: Virtual Physics Website Developer English Page
responsibilities: Responsible for the daily management and maintenance of the server to ensure stable operation of the system
Monitor server performance and handle hardware failures and software abnormalities in a timely manner
Manage data backup and security policies to prevent data loss and security incidents
Optimize server configuration and performance to improve system efficiency
requirements: Bachelor degree or above, computer-related major
Have rich experience in server management and familiar with Linux/Windows server operations
Excellent problem-solving skills, able to quickly locate and solve problems
